name: Project Nimbus
description: Project Nimbus is a high speed mech action game set in a post apocalyptic world. Players control 'Battle Frames' - humanoid battle suits armed with an arsenal of weapons.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATi HD5750 {Any card that support Shader Model 3.0 shall be able to run the game) DirectX: Version 9.0c Additional Notes:
